product_name: C Crane CC SW Pocket Radio
long_description: The C Crane CC SW pocket radio offers exceptional reception and audio quality for its compact size and is sensitive enough to outperform many other radios in its class. Store and access up to 200 of your favorite AM, FM, and shortwave stations with the favorites feature; radio remembers your favorites even if you take out the batteries. Keypad lets you enter specific frequencies; tuner knob lets you manually scan the digital dial. Receives broadcasts on FM 70.0 - 108.0, on telescoping whip antenna, AM 522 - 1620/520-1710 on internal ferrite bar antenna and shortwave 2300 - 7500 and 9200 - 2200. The C Crane CC SW pocket radio features a flip-out stand, speaker, alarm clock with 12- and 24-hr. modes, stereo headphone jack, 90-min. sleep timer and display light. Comes with a carrying pouch, wrist lanyard and user manual; runs on 2 AA batteries (sold separately) or AC adapter (not included).
short_description: The C Crane CC SW pocket radio offers exceptional reception and audio quality for its compact size and is sensitive enough to outperform many other radios in its class.
